body:
Needs to be rebased against bleed.

On 2015-06-27, at 12:00 AM, atlimit8 notifications@github.com wrote:

> A branch I created about 7 months ago and just rebased.
> Adds:
> 
> DamageMultiplier
> FirepowerMultiplier
> InaccuracyMultiplier
> ReloadTimeMultiplier
> SpeedMultiplier
> PowerMultiplier Removes as redundant:
> Invulnerable
> GainsStatUpgrades
> InvulnerabilityUpgrade
> This should remove GainsStatUpgrades bug(s) by simply replacing it.
> 
> You can view, comment on, or merge this pull request online at:
> 
>   https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/8566
> 
> Commit Summary
> 
> Update NukePaletteEffect for premultiplied alpha.
> Add nuke flash to D2K.
> fix error CS0219:
> copy it in the make dependencies step
> Fix Nod attacking the world in gdi05b
> Fixed captured buildings producing bot controled units
> Disable hijackers in monster tank madness
> Fix potentially removing actors twice from world in Actor::ChangeOwner
> use premultiplied alpha on geometric renderers
> Add a missing DamageType to missions which re-define weapons
> Add missing DamageType to deviator weapon
> Update gdi05a mission preview image.
> Add hightech to Prerequisite of Stealth Raider
> Make speedModifiers Lazy
> Fix tesla zaps being visible under the fog
> Fix an invalid owner init entry in nod05.
> Don't crash when trying to protect a harvester against a dead (not in world) enemy
> Fix WithBuildingPlacedAnimation interrupting WithMakeAnimation
> Add MustBeDestroyed: to FCOM
> Fix d2k tooltips.
> Build prep branches on Travis, too
> Added multiplier modifier traits, removing GainsStatUpgrades, InvulnerabilityUpgrade, & Invulnerable.
> File Changes
> 
> M .travis.yml (1)
> M Makefile (1)
> M OpenRA.Game/Actor.cs (9)
> M OpenRA.Game/Graphics/LineRenderer.cs (4)
> M OpenRA.Game/Graphics/QuadRenderer.cs (1)
> M OpenRA.Game/Graphics/Util.cs (12)
> M OpenRA.Mods.Common/EditorBrushes/EditorResourceBrush.cs (1)
> M OpenRA.Mods.Common/OpenRA.Mods.Common.csproj (9)
> D OpenRA.Mods.Common/Traits/Invulnerable.cs (23)
> M OpenRA.Mods.Common/Traits/Mobile.cs (21)
> A OpenRA.Mods.Common/Traits/Multipliers/DamageMultiplier.cs (34)
> A OpenRA.Mods.Common/Traits/Multipliers/FirepowerMultiplier.cs     (31)
> A OpenRA.Mods.Common/Traits/Multipliers/InaccuracyMultiplier.cs (31)
> A OpenRA.Mods.Common/Traits/Multipliers/PowerMultiplier.cs (39)
> A OpenRA.Mods.Common/Traits/Multipliers/ReloadTimeMultiplier.cs (31)
> A OpenRA.Mods.Common/Traits/Multipliers/SpeedMultiplier.cs (31)
> A OpenRA.Mods.Common/Traits/Multipliers/UpgradableMultiplierTrait.cs (75)
> M OpenRA.Mods.Common/Traits/PaletteEffects/NukePaletteEffect.cs (6)
> M OpenRA.Mods.Common/Traits/Render/WithBuildingPlacedAnimation.cs (12)
> D OpenRA.Mods.Common/Traits/Upgrades/GainsStatUpgrades.cs (127)
> M OpenRA.Mods.Common/UtilityCommands/UpgradeRules.cs (105)
> M OpenRA.Mods.RA/Graphics/TeslaZapRenderable.cs (4)
> M OpenRA.Mods.RA/OpenRA.Mods.RA.csproj (1)
> D OpenRA.Mods.RA/Traits/InvulnerabilityUpgrade.cs (32)
> M artsrc/cnc/campaign/gdi05w.psd     (0)
> M make.ps1 (1)
> M mods/cnc/maps/gdi01/map.yaml     (2)
> M mods/cnc/maps/gdi04c/map.yaml (3)
> M mods/cnc/maps/gdi05a/map.png     (0)
> M mods/cnc/maps/gdi05b/gdi05b.lua (2)
> M mods/cnc/maps/gdi05b/map.yaml (4)
> M mods/cnc/maps/nod01/map.yaml     (3)
> M mods/cnc/maps/nod02a/nod02a.lua (12)
> M mods/cnc/maps/nod02b/nod02b.lua (12)
> M mods/cnc/maps/nod05/map.yaml     (2)
> M mods/cnc/maps/nod05/nod05.lua (4)
> M mods/cnc/rules/aircraft.yaml (3)
> M mods/cnc/rules/defaults.yaml (66)
> M mods/d2k/chrome/tooltips.yaml (22)
> M mods/d2k/rules/aircraft.yaml (3)

> M mods/d2k/rules/structures.yaml (1)

> M mods/ra/maps/allies-01/map.yaml (2)

> M mods/ra/maps/allies-05a/AI.lua (4)
> M mods/ra/maps/allies-05a/map.yaml (2)
> M mods/ra/maps/desert-shellmap/map.yaml (27)
> M mods/ra/maps/drop-zone-w/map.yaml (2)

> M mods/ra/maps/intervention/map.yaml (2)
> M mods/ra/maps/koth-hopes-anchor/map.yaml (3)
> M mods/ra/maps/monster-tank-madness/map.yaml (3)
> M mods/ra/rules/defaults.yaml (16)
> M mods/ra/rules/misc.yaml (3)
> M mods/ra/rules/vehicles.yaml (2)
> M mods/ts/rules/defaults.yaml (56)
> M thirdparty/fetch-geoip-db.sh (1)
> M thirdparty/fetch-thirdparty-deps.ps1 (1)

> 
> https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/8566.patch
> https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/8566.diff

disregard, sent before i saw the close
